title: This Week's Top Stories - Woolly Mammoth Reboot, Nicki Minaj's Vaccine Tweet Fallout & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Woolly Mammoth Reboot, Nicki Minaj's Vaccine Tweet Fallout & More
description:
Scientists plan to resurrect woolly mammoths, Nicki Minaj sparks a controversy with a tweet about her cousin's friend getting swollen testicles due to vaccination, and Instagram harms teens.
